header: {"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36", "Referer": "https://www.sudugu.org/"}

ruleBookInfo.name: h1@text||.booktitle h1@text
ruleBookInfo.author: .bookinfo ul li:eq(0)@text||#info > div.book-info > ul > li:eq(0) > span:eq(1)@text
ruleBookInfo.kind: .bookinfo ul li:eq(1)@text||#info > div.book-info > ul > li:eq(2) > a@text
ruleBookInfo.lastChapter: .bookinfo ul li:eq(4) a@text||#info > div.book-info > ul > li:eq(5) > a@text
ruleBookInfo.wordCount: .bookinfo ul li:eq(2)@text||#info > div.book-info > ul > li:eq(1) > span:eq(1)@text
ruleBookInfo.status: .bookinfo ul li:eq(3)@text||#info > div.book-info > ul > li:eq(3) > span:eq(1)@text

ruleContent.imageStyle: display: block; margin: 0 auto; max-width: 100%; height: auto;
